w:r.w:t: Slime Idle Game - MVP Design Document

This MVP focuses on delivering a core, playable loop with simplified systems. Players control a slime that auto-bounces through rooms, defeating defenders to gain Monster Energy, which is used to upgrade 6 Tier 1 nodes that enhance the slime's capabilities. The goal is to progress through 40 rooms with a reset system that provides permanent multipliers.
No status effects, elemental damage, or size mechanics
Active play only (no offline progression for MVP)
Slime auto-bounces through rooms, colliding with defenders
Gains Monster Energy from defeated entities
Upgrades Tier 1 nodes using Monster Energy
Resets around room 10 (or when stuck) for permanent multipliers
